I want to get Smackdown Bring It, that could be good for PS2.  I actually 
liked Sega Saturn, Virtual Fighter 2 and Virtual Cop were fun as hell.  But 
they kind of stopped, so oh well.  Not to mention it had RoboPit.  But I'll 
probably get the X-Box WWF game instead of the PS2.  Oh well.  Should 
probably start a section on the message board for this but, eh, I'm lazy.



-L.U.
